relics.name: Mystical banner
relics.description: When the flag is Planted, gain 1 Aura: Might.
relics.flavorText: The family banner, it stands steadfast.

relics.name: Mighty banner
relics.description: When the flag is Planted, gain 1 additional Aura: Might.

relics.name: Gleaming Gemstone
relics.flavorText: A shiny gemstone... how many of these do you have again?

relics.name: Initiative
relics.description: Start each combat with the flag Planted.

relics.name: Frozen Hourglass
relics.description: Whenever you play a card with Suspend, draw 1 additional card at the start of your next turn.
relics.flavorText: Despite time moving forward, the grains of sand remain still.

relics.name: Winged Locket
relics.description: When you would die, heal to 1 HP instead and become protected until next turn. (works once).

relics.name: Ethereal banner
relics.description:
Whenever the flag is Planted,
Pulse an additional time.
Whenever the flag is Recalled gain an additional [E] .
relics.flavorText: A symbol is not only an object. It's also the hope brought with it.

relics.name: Family Crest
relics.description: If the flag is Planted, gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: The wings give an air of safety.

relics.name: Royal Tiara
relics.flavorText: The tea she serves is warm like her company.

relics.name: Sapphire Heart
relics.description: Start each combat with 2 Pulses in hand.
relics.flavorText: Its aura resonates like a heartbeat.

potions.name: Bottled Aeons
potions.description:
Take an extra turn after this one.
Time Sickness 1.
End your turn.

keywords.name: Aura: Might
keywords.description: While the flag is planted deal X additional damage and gain X additional block.

keywords.name: Banner Magic
keywords.description: This card can only be played while the flag is Held.

keywords.name: Maintain Light
keywords.description: Maintain Light is a token card with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Maintain Light+
keywords.description: Maintain Light+ is a token card with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Time Curse
keywords.description: Time Curse is a token Status.

keywords.name: Time Sickness
keywords.description: Draw less cards next turn equal to the value of Time Sickness.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.

keywords.name: Aura
keywords.description:
Auras are only active while the flag is Planted.
Effects become inactive when the flag is Recalled.
If the flag is already Planted, effects will be applied.

keywords.name: Buyback
keywords.description: Return the specified card from the discard pile to your Hand.

keywords.name: Chaser
keywords.description: Chaser is a token card with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Chaser+
keywords.description: Chaser+ is a token card with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Drain
keywords.description:
The enemy deals X less damage with attacks.
The max amount of Drain applied to an enemy is equal to your Aura: Drain stacks.

keywords.name: Fatigue
keywords.description:
Fatigue is gained every turn while Planted and reduces the effectiveness of Aura: Might.
When Fatigue reaches 3, the flag is automatically Recalled.

keywords.name: Flight
keywords.description: Receives 50% less attack damage. Cancelled if dealt unblocked attack damage a certain number of times.

keywords.name: Focus
keywords.description: Focus is a token card with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Focus+
keywords.description: Focus+ is a token card with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Held
keywords.description: You are holding the flag, good job Flagbearer.

keywords.name: Paradox
keywords.description: A card with this card's name can only be played once per turn.

keywords.name: Plant
keywords.description: If the flag is Held, it becomes Planted, you gain 1 Aura: Might, and trigger Pulse (Deals 3 damage to ALL enemies).

keywords.name: Planted
keywords.description: The flag is on the battlefield.

keywords.name: Pulse
keywords.description: If the flag is Planted, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Pulses
keywords.description: Pulse is a token card with Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Recall
keywords.description:
If the flag is Planted, it becomes Held.
When the flag is Recalled gain [E] .

keywords.name: Recalled
keywords.description: The flag becomes Recalled if a card with Recall is played while the flag is Planted.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: Target will not act.

keywords.name: Suspend
keywords.description: This effect is played at the beginning of your next turn.

mods.name: TheFlagbearer
mods.description:
The Flagbearer custom character mod. Overcome the Spire by casting powerful buff magic.

 Steadfast is the banner, bolstered by its weilder.
